frontmatter.title: Button guidelines
frontmatter.description: Use this guide to make your labels predictable and consequential. Your users depend on them, give it some thought and time.

internal.content:
--- title: Button guidelines description: Use this guide to make your labels predictable and consequential. Your users depend on them, give it some thought and time. tabs: ['Confusing buttons', 'Button glossary'] --- #### A
##### Access Use it to give permission to enter a website or give access to secured content. Access denied Access Denied!
##### Accept Lets the user agree to an action. See also: Decline Accept and continue Accept & continue
##### Activate Use it to make an account or profile active. Activate account Activate Your Account!

#### B
##### Back Lets the user return to the previous step, page or a window. Go back Go back instead
##### Browse Use it to locate and select desired files or documents from a local or a remote system. Browse Browse files Browsing... Browse another file

#### C
##### Cancel Use it to cancel the existing action and close the current modal, dialog, page etc. Cancel Abort

##### Access Use it to give permission to enter a website or give access to secured content. Access denied Access Denied!

##### Activate Use it to make an account or profile active. Activate account Activate Your Account!
